name: Zest Venture Sdn. Bhd.
description: Operator of a wedding card-based retail platform intended to offer an easy, fast, and stress-free process of personalized wedding cards to customers. The company's platform engages in the selling, printing, designing, and distribution of personalized invitation and greeting cards, enabling designers to sell their work globally specialized for wedding, kids, and lifestyle products.
one_liner: Operator of a wedding card-based retail platform intended to offer an easy, fast, and stress-free process of personalized wedding cards to customers. The company's platform engages in the selling, printing, designing, and distribution of personalized invitation and greeting cards, enabling designers to sell their work globally specialized for wedding, kids, and lifestyle products.

name: Amp Me Inc.
description: Developer of a music application designed to synchronize multiple audio devices together to play the music louder. The company's application offers syncing and Bluetooth functions that facilitate a seamless connection between portable speakers and smartphones, enabling customers to synchronize their phones and create a portable sound system.
one_liner: Developer of a music application designed to synchronize multiple audio devices together to play the music louder. The company's application offers syncing and Bluetooth functions that facilitate a seamless connection between portable speakers and smartphones, enabling customers to synchronize their phones and create a portable sound system.

name: Audiodraft, Inc.
description: Developer of an online audio branding platform designed to outsource audio productions to a network of musicians and sound designers. The company's platform offers custom-made music and sound design for television commercials, theme music for mobile games, and audio logos for companies, enabling clients to create open sound design contests, where sound designers compete and audio content can be bought for various media use.
one_liner: Developer of an online audio branding platform designed to outsource audio productions to a network of musicians and sound designers. The company's platform offers custom-made music and sound design for television commercials, theme music for mobile games, and audio logos for companies, enabling clients to create open sound design contests, where sound designers compete and audio content can be bought for various media use.

name: Beatdapp Software Inc.
description: Operator of a SaaS-based platform intended to help music labels and artists track their songs to collect royalties. The company's tracking system authenticates, verifies, and validates media streamed in real-time and reduces the tracking discrepancies between Digital Service Providers (DSPs) and rights holders, enabling DSPs to increase their royalty revenue for rights holders while limiting legal exposure to royalty lawsuits.
one_liner: Operator of a SaaS-based platform intended to help music labels and artists track their songs to collect royalties. The company's tracking system authenticates, verifies, and validates media streamed in real-time and reduces the tracking discrepancies between Digital Service Providers (DSPs) and rights holders, enabling DSPs to increase their royalty revenue for rights holders while limiting legal exposure to royalty lawsuits.

name: Canva Inc.
description: Operator of an online graphic design platform intended to democratize access to design and visual communication. The company's platform offers drag-and-drop features and professional layouts to consistently design graphics through a vast collection of professionally designed layouts to personalize the design with a stock library of photographs, illustrations and imagery, enabling companies and users to design presentations, and social media graphics with appropriate layouts.
one_liner: Operator of an online graphic design platform intended to democratize access to design and visual communication. The company's platform offers drag-and-drop features and professional layouts to consistently design graphics through a vast collection of professionally designed layouts to personalize the design with a stock library of photographs, illustrations and imagery, enabling companies and users to design presentations, and social media graphics with appropriate layouts.

name: ConceptDrop Inc
description: Operator of an online marketplace platform designed to connect enterprises with the world's leading creative talents. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to pair creative professionals and provides agency-quality marketing material, enabling enterprises to build teams, manage human capital, and predict future performance.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace platform designed to connect enterprises with the world's leading creative talents. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to pair creative professionals and provides agency-quality marketing material, enabling enterprises to build teams, manage human capital, and predict future performance.

name: CreoPop Pte Ltd
description: Developer of a three-dimensional (3D) printing pen designed to bring drawings to life without the risk of heating or melting. The company's pen is battery-operated and charged through a mini universal serial bus (USB), it uses light-sensitive ink called photopolymers that is immediately solidified by light-emitting diodes (LED) surrounding the nozzle of the pen when a button is pressed, enabling children and artists to draw their vision in three-dimension (3D).
one_liner: Developer of a three-dimensional (3D) printing pen designed to bring drawings to life without the risk of heating or melting. The company's pen is battery-operated and charged through a mini universal serial bus (USB), it uses light-sensitive ink called photopolymers that is immediately solidified by light-emitting diodes (LED) surrounding the nozzle of the pen when a button is pressed, enabling children and artists to draw their vision in three-dimension (3D).

name: DDC Enterprise Limited
description: DDC Enterprise Ltd is a content driven consumer brand offering easy, convenient ready-to-heat , ready-to-cook and plant-based meal products i.e. meal products consisting largely or solely of vegetables, fruits, grains and other foods derived from plant-based protein, rather than animal protein) while promoting healthier lifestyle choices to Millennial and Generation Z customer-base. It is also engaged in the provision of advertising services and the operation of experience stores to offer cooking classes.
one_liner: DDC Enterprise Ltd is a content driven consumer brand offering easy, convenient ready-to-heat , ready-to-cook and plant-based meal products i.e. meal products consisting largely or solely of vegetables, fruits, grains and other foods derived from plant-based protein, rather than animal protein) while promoting healthier lifestyle choices to Millennial and Generation Z customer-base. It is also engaged in the provision of advertising services and the operation of experience stores to offer cooking classes.

name: Vidcaster Inc.
description: Developer of an online video platform and video site creator for video producers. The company offers an application platform that enables users to create, manage and share online videos.
one_liner: Developer of an online video platform and video site creator for video producers. The company offers an application platform that enables users to create, manage and share online videos.

name: Breaker Co. Ltd
description: Tokyo-based social media branding agency connecting the world to Japan.
one_liner: Tokyo-based social media branding agency connecting the world to Japan.

name: Zya, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile based music creation software designed to democratize music creation and expression through imaginative games and apps. The company's Ditty application offers a technology platform that powers musical communication across a range of products and integrations with global companies enabling users to personalize their video, music, and message and collaborate with artists on a variety of platforms including web portals, mobile devices and gaming consoles.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile based music creation software designed to democratize music creation and expression through imaginative games and apps. The company's Ditty application offers a technology platform that powers musical communication across a range of products and integrations with global companies enabling users to personalize their video, music, and message and collaborate with artists on a variety of platforms including web portals, mobile devices and gaming consoles.

name: ViKi, Inc.
description: Provider of online video services. The company provides a platform for streaming premium TV shows and movies, as well as crowdsourcing subtitles in more than 160 languages.
one_liner: Provider of online video services. The company provides a platform for streaming premium TV shows and movies, as well as crowdsourcing subtitles in more than 160 languages.

name: Khush
description: Developer of music applications for mobile phones. The company's application analyzes the user's voice and composes music to match.
one_liner: Developer of music applications for mobile phones. The company's application analyzes the user's voice and composes music to match.
